p: In 2017, among the 2,113 providers funded for any service category by the RWHAP, 6.2% (n = 132) were located in HRSA-designated rural areas ( Table 1). Only 0.1% (n = 2) of RWHAP providers were classified as “metro-rural” and 1.6% (n = 34) were in frontier and remote areas. Among 922 RWHAP providers funded to deliver OAHS, 7.6% (n = 70) were in rural areas, with 0.2% (n = 2) in metro-rural areas and 2.0% (n = 18) in frontier and remote areas.
